Name: A Show of Kindness
About the game: A Show of Kindness is a three-act VR experience through which the user navigates an unfolding story frozen in time, crafted with meticulous detail by concept artist Peter Chan using a custom build of Tilt Brush. Tilt Brush’s room-scale technology allows users to walk through three scenes and listen to the ambient sounds that each character inspires. In this three part story, you will journey with our protagonist, a young girl searching for a home, through staggering environments and whimsical creations in Chan’s heartwarming immersive storytelling vignette. Developed and published by Google as part of the Tilt Brush Artist in Residence Program.
